summary: An Ordinance relating to the method of levying and collecting special assessments and the making of the local improvement for the improvement of Shilshole Avenue from Fourteenth Avenue West to 496.08 feet west of the intersection of 22nd Avenue Northwest and Shilshole Avenue, and certain other streets, by grading and regarding the same under Ordinance No. 30389 creating Local Improvement District No. 2601.
